description: A billing group is a set of linked account which belong to the same end customer. It can be seen as a virtual consolidated billing family.

BillingGroupStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | PRIMARY_ACCOUNT_MISSING  
Update requires: No interruption

PricingPlanArn.description: ARN of the attached pricing plan
PricingPlanArn.markdownDescription:
ARN of the attached pricing plan

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::(aws|[0-9]{12}):pricingplan/(BasicPricingPlan|[a-zA-Z0-9]{10})  
Update requires: No interruption

ComputationPreference.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [0-9]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption

LinkedAccountIds.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ResponsibilityTransferArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-.]{0,62}:organizations::[0-9]{12}:transfer/o-[a-z0-9]{10,32}/(billing)/(inbound|outbound)/rt-[0-9a-z]{8,32}  
Update requires: No interruption

AutoAssociate.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AccountGrouping.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
Billing Group ARN

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:billinggroup/?[a-zA-Z0-9]{10,12}  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

PrimaryAccountId.description: This account will act as a virtual payer account of the billing group
PrimaryAccountId.markdownDescription:
This account will act as a virtual payer account of the billing group

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Pattern: [0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement
